text: Jordi Bonet i Armengol (12 May 1925 - 20 June 2022) was a Spanish architect. He was born in Barcelona, Spain. His father worked with Antoni Gaudí. He was known as the construction manager of the Sagrada Família from 1987 until 2012. In 2019, he was nominated to be a member of the Pontifical Academy of Fine Arts and Letters of the Virtuosi al Pantheon. Bonet died on 20 June 2022 in Barcelona at the age of 97.Mor l'arquitecte Jordi Bonet, un enamorat de Gaudí i continuador de la Sagrada Família ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Architects from Barcelona
